betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Traveler's Boots-
Created through the process of Arcane Infusion on leather boots. Here's how the item works:

Functionality:
These boots increase the player's movement speed and jump height.
They slightly enhance the movement speed in water.
The boots automatically step up one block when walking over it.
The boots require Vis (spiritual energy) to function, which can be charged by placing them on a Charging Pedestal to absorb surrounding Vis. The boots have a Vis capacity of 240 points.
Alternatively, the player can wear a Mana Charm to continuously charge the boots, no matter where they are.
Durability:
The durability of the Traveler's Boots is based on the durability of the leather boots used in the crafting recipe, so using full-durability leather boots will ensure the best result.
This item is useful for players who wish to increase mobility and explore the world faster, and the ability to charge them continuously provides convenience for longer journeys.
